titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to the treatment of certain domestic services under the unemployment tax.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary: 4/28/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude certain domestic services providing personal attendance, companionship, or household care from the unemployment tax.
